title: Drawing, "Female Head with Closed Eyes"
description: Centered on the page, the present view is of a female with curly hair cascading in ringlets from a center part down the sides of the face, and ending just below chin level. Closed eyes under upward-slanting brows; straight nose; and full, closed lips comprise the facial features, overlaid by shading, which is heaviest on the lower part of the face.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Female Head with Closed Eyes".
25.4 x 20 cm (10 x 7 7/8 in.). Gift of Ellen Gustav Jensen. 1956-47-43.
